name: "Acid Hands" McGillicutty

effect: When this ally enters play, she heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Arcane Missiles

name: Arcane Shot
effect: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card.

name: Arcanite Reaper
effect: The arcanite reaper was long the mark of a true warrior in Azeroth. Having one crafted was like a rite of passage.

name: Backstab
effect: Your hero deals melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally equal to 3 plus the ATK of a Dagger you control.

name: Benethor Draigo
effect: In life he cooked meat for his brothers. In death he cooked his brothers for meat.

name: Besora Galefeather

effect: When this ally enters play, draw a card.

name: Bloodclaw

name: Bloodsoul
effect: This ally can attack only heroes.

name: Charge

name: Chastise
effect: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

name: Slay the Feeble
effect: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
If a rogue is present, it's never a fair fight.

name: Slayer's Waistguard
effect: You pay (3) less to strike with weapons while your hero is defending.
To the victor of Halaa go its spoils.

name: Soul Inversion
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / -2.
"There's always a cost for power - you just have to decide whether or not you can afford it." - Forang Deathrattle

name: Soulstone
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: When attached ally is destroyed, its owner may put it from his graveyard into play.
"The shadows will grant you another life, try not to waste it this time." - Pidge Filthfinder

name: Starfire
effect: Your hero deals 5 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card.
The very heavens echoed the druid's rage and opened up at his command.

name: Starshot
effect: Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target ally. Draw a card.
None can stand against the ancient power of the night sky.

name: Steal Essence
effect: Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.
"Tonight, I'll drink to your health - may it long be mine."

name: Sylvanas, Lady of Undercity
effect:
Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this ally.)
When this ally deals fatal damage to a defending ally, you may put target [Horde] ally with cost less than or equal to that defending ally's cost from your graveyard into play.
"We are the Forsaken. We will slaughter anyone who stands in our way."

name: Ta'zo
effect: On your turn: (3), Flip Ta'zo → Ta'zo deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally.
"You play wit da fire, mon, you gonna get da burn!"

name: Tabards of the Illidari
effect:
If you control an ally: Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"These will do quite nicely." - Kor'kron Wind Rider

name: Taunt
effect:
Attach to target hero or ally.

Ongoing: Attached character must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.
"Your mother was a furbolg and your father smells of elekk turd!" - Blaine Roberts

name: Taz'dingo
effect: When this ally enters play, he deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: The Defense of Grom'gol
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put all revealed allies into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"Your arrival at Grom'gol is timely, indeed." - Commander Aggro'gosh

name: The Fel and the Furious
effect:
If your hero has more damage than an opposing hero: Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Whatever you do, don't forget to destroy as much as you can!" - Plexi

name: The Natural Order
effect: Destroy target ability or equipment.
It is nature's will to provide balance.

name: The Path of Conquest
effect:
If no opposing allies are in play: Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Indeed, these troublesome whelps are up to something insidious." - Kor'kron Wind Rider

name: The Unending Invasion
effect:
Pay (4) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card, then draw another one for each 10 damage on your hero.
"Beings of pure mana began streaming into the village from all over the area. For now, we're containing them as we can ..." - Lieutenant-Sorcerer Morran

name: Thunder Clap
effect: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way has -1 ATK this turn.

name: Timmo Shadestep
effect: On your turn: (5), Flip Timmo → Destroy target exhausted ally.
The ability to hide in half a shadow makes gnomes among Azeroth's deadliest assassins.

name: Trixie Boltclunker
effect: Protector
"Just remember to thank the little people once I've saved your life."

name: Trophy Kill
effect: Destroy target ally with cost 4 or more.
Hunters pride themselves on felling the most dangerous of beasts.

name: Tyrennius Scatheblade
effect: Protector

name: Valanos
effect: "Kodo and stag? HA! Try hunting clefthoof and talbuk."

name: Vanda Skydaughter
effect: "Nature isn't just around you. It's above you as well."

name: Varah, Fury of the Stars
effect: Assault 2
"It is at night when our people shine brightest."

name: Vesh'ral
effect: Ferocity

name: Vesperia Silversong
effect: This ally can't attack heroes.
"Weaken the outliers first, and the others will cluster."

name: Vindicator Enkallus
effect: Protector
"Spirits of this land, hear my call!"

name: Vindictive Strike
effect: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally dealt damage this turn.
"The Scourge will gain no sympathy from the Light." - Graccus

name: Wand of Eternal Light
effect: Damage that would be dealt with this weapon is unpreventable.

name: Wanted: Durn the Hungerer
effect:
If an opposing ally was destroyed this turn: Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Durn's murderous grip has been loosed! Nagrand has a brighter tomorrow because of you, hero. Well done!" - Warden Bullrok

name: Waz'luk
effect: When this ally enters play, he deals 1 fire damage to target hero.
He makes quite a first impression.

name: Whirlwind
effect: Your hero deals melee damage to each opposing ally equal to the ATK of a Melee weapon you control.
All men enter, no men leave.

name: Wrath
effect: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally.
Nature's fury is awesome to behold.

name: You Are Rakh'likh, Demon
effect:
Pay (4) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if you control a Demon.
"Should you defeat the Defiler, bring back his horn. It will become a symbol of hope for all that view it - proof that heroes do exist in this war-torn world." - Fallen Hero of the Horde

name: Your Fortune Awaits You
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
Fortune favors the bold.

name: Zapped Giants
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"I'm going to have to do something about the giants if I stay out here!" - Zorbin Fandazzle

name: Zari'zari
effect: Berserking
"Don't make me angry. Joo wouldn't like me when I'm angry."

name: Zaritha
effect: (2), Flip Zaritha → Zaritha heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.
"I beseech the wind and sky - heed me now and hear my cry!"

name: Zi'mo
effect: Berserking
The Darkspear thrive under pressure.

name: Zygore Bladebreaker
effect: When this ally enters play, you may destroy target armor or weapon.
